title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received the Director General, Institute for Peace and Conflict Resolution (IPCR), Dr. Joseph Peter Ochogwu.

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received the Director General, Institute for Peace and Conflict Resolution (IPCR), Dr. Joseph Peter Ochogwu and his Management Team on a courtesy visit today, 21st July, 2023.

Discussions centered on enhancing synergy between MFA and IPCR for the good of the nation.
